Package org.mozilla.taskcluster.client.ec2manager

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    EC2Manager
    A taskcluster service which manages EC2 instances.
    Entry1
    See http://schemas.taskcluster.net/ec2-manager/v1/prices.json#/items
    Entry2
    See http://schemas.taskcluster.net/ec2-manager/v1/prices-request.json#/items
    Errors
    This method returns a list of errors.
    HealthOfTheEC2Account
    This method provides a summary of the health in the EC2 account being managed.
    LaunchInfo
    This is an EC2-Manager specific wrapping of the request body for the upstream EC2 API.
    MakeASpotRequest
    Presented here are the fields that are absolutely 100% required to make a spot request.
    OverviewOfComputationalResources
    Overview of computational resources for a given worker typeSee http://schemas.taskcluster.net/ec2-manager/v1/worker-type-resources.json#
    OverviewOfComputationalResources1
    Overview of computational resources for a given worker typeSee http://schemas.taskcluster.net/ec2-manager/v1/worker-type-state.json#
    SshPublicKey
    See http://schemas.taskcluster.net/ec2-manager/v1/create-key-pair.json#
    Var
    See http://schemas.taskcluster.net/ec2-manager/v1/worker-type-resources.json#/properties/pending/items
    Var1
    This is a list of outcomes for a specific region, availability zone and instance type.
    Var2
    See http://schemas.taskcluster.net/ec2-manager/v1/health.json#/properties/running/items
    Var3
    This is a list of summaries of instances which have terminatedSee http://schemas.taskcluster.net/ec2-manager/v1/health.json#/properties/terminationHealth/items
    Var4
    See http://schemas.taskcluster.net/ec2-manager/v1/errors.json#/properties/errors/items
